info.name: DigiWin Homepage - Section 7: Stats Bar
info.description: Full-width dark navy stats bar with 4 key metrics: 44 Years, 50,000+ Factories, 100+ Thai Implementations, 300378 Stock Code. Number counters animate on scroll.
divi_modules_used: et_pb_text (stock code - static text, not counter)
notes: Stock code 300378 uses Text module (not counter) since it's not a metric to animate
Number counters animate from 0 to target number on scroll
This section acts as a visual divider between content sections
